snippet: The state education commissioner threatened to withhold federal funds if new plans for a teacher evaluation system for New York City weren’t submitted by Feb. 15.
abstract: New York State Education Commissioner John B King Jr threatens to withhold more than $1 billion from New York City, including its share of federal Race to the Top grants, if plans for a teacher evaluation system are not submitted by Feb 15.
lead_paragraph: The state education commissioner threatened to withhold federal funds if new plans for a teacher evaluation system for New York City weren’t submitted by Feb. 15.

headline.seo: More Money at Risk Over Teacher Evaluations
headline.main: More Money at Risk on Teacher Evaluations
headline.print_headline: More Money at Risk On Teacher Evaluations
